import java.util.Scanner;

public class Main {

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Scanner input = new Scanner(System.in);
        int t = input.nextInt();
        for (int i = 0; i < t; i++) {
            String s1 = input.next();
            String s2 = input.next();
            if (s1.length() == s2.length()) {
                int[] c1 = new int[26];
                int[] c2 = new int[26];
                for (int j = 0; j < 26; j++) c1[j] = c2[j] = 0;
                for (int j = 0; j < s1.length(); j++) c1[s1.charAt(j) - 'a']++;
                for (int j = 0; j < s2.length(); j++) c2[s2.charAt(j) - 'a']++;
                boolean isAnagram = true;
                for (int j = 0; j < 26; j++)
                    if (c1[j] != c2[j]) {
                        isAnagram = false;
                        break;
                    }
                if (isAnagram) System.out.println("YES");
                else System.out.println("NO");
            } else System.out.println("NO");

        }
    }

}
